Values for CONFIG_TIMER.

Select which hardware timer interrupt to use for system clock and softtimers.

 Default system timer.
#define TIMER_DEFAULT   TIMER_ON_GPTM
 Default system timer.

 HW dependent timer initialization.

 Default system timer.
